name: East Bank Hospital - M Health Fairview University of Minnesota Medical Center
alternate_name: East Bank Hospital - M Health Fairview University of Minnesota Medical Center
description: Due to limited supplies, the state lab is only testing the highest priority samples, which include hospitalized COVID-19 patients, ill health care workers and ill people living in group settings like nursing homes. People who do not have symptoms should not be tested for COVID-19.

name: M Health Fairview Clinics and Surgery Center - Minneapolis
alternate_name: M Health Fairview Clinics and Surgery Center - Minneapolis
description: Due to limited supplies, the state lab is only testing the highest priority samples, which include hospitalized COVID-19 patients, ill health care workers and ill people living in group settings like nursing homes. People who do not have symptoms should not be tested for COVID-19.

name: Mayo Building and Gonda Building
description: Your doctor may determine whether to conduct tests for COVID-19 based on your signs and symptoms. To decide whether to conduct tests for COVID-19, he or she may also consider whether you have had close contact with someone diagnosed with COVID-19 or traveled to or lived in any areas with ongoing community spread of COVID-19 in the last 14 days.
